title: Can't Find Personal Shop
body: I looked all through the client and can't find my Personal Shop anywhere. It isn't on the home page, collection, normal shop, or loot section.

replies.body:
Hey guys, I double checked and it's still there.  You'll need to swap your screen from Worlds 2017 to Overview, and you'll see it on the top right.  

Example:
https://i.imgur.com/ujfSamh.png

If you're not seeing it, toss me a screenshot so we can take a look.
ME TOO. I DEMAND FREE SKIN {{summoner:4}}
I have the same problem here, and from my last screen shot the expiration date is October 4.
